about_the_game:
Cozy Desktop Konbini is a cozy and relaxing idle game about managing a Konbini that stays at the bottom of your screen.

Everything is Automated

Your Konbini runs smoothly on its own—restock shelves, serve customers, and earn money, all while you focus on other tasks.

Multitasking

This idle game sits at the bottom of your screen, letting you manage your shop while studying, working, or just relaxing.

Decorate your Konbini

Customize your tiny Konbini with shelves, displays, and decorations to create the coziest shopping experience.

Unlock New Products and Buildings

Expand your Konbini with new shelves, vending machines, and unique products to attract more customers and grow your business!

Make a tiny gym

Some exercise wouldn’t hurt, right? Add a small gym section to your Konbini and let your customers work out while they shop!

It’s Perfect for You, If You :

🍙 Need a little break from your work

🍙 Need a little dopamine boost

🍙 Love decorating and customizing your own space

🍙 Enjoy cozy, low-maintenance games

🍙 Appreciate chill vibes and relaxing lofi music
